getCategoryTypeByMIMEType

private CategoryType getCategoryTypeByMIMEType(HibernateUtil.Operation operation,
                                               java.lang.String mimeType)
                                        throws ServiceException
Parameters:
operation - Operation
mimeType - Mime type
Returns:
Category type associated to that MIME type
Throws:
ServiceException

getResources

private java.util.List<Resource> getResources(HibernateUtil.Operation operation,
                                              User viewer,
                                              User user,
                                              long categoryId,
                                              boolean includeSubcategories,
                                              java.lang.String mimeType,
                                              long copyrightId,
                                              boolean sortedByName)
                                       throws ServiceException
Parameters:
operation - Operation
viewer - User used to check visibility
user - User or null to get resources from all users
categoryId - Filtering category identifier or 0 to get resources from all categories
includeSubcategories - Include resources from categories derived from filtering category
mimeType - Filtering MIME type or empty string to get resources with all MIME types
copyrightId - Filtering copyright identifier or 0 to get resources with all copyrights
sortedByName - Flag to indicate if we want the results sorted by name
Returns:
List of resources filtered by user, category (and optionally subcategories) and MIME type and optionally sorted by name
Throws:
ServiceException

getResources

public java.util.List<Resource> getResources(User user)
                                      throws ServiceException
Parameters:
user - User or null to get resources from all users
Returns:
List of resources filtered by user
Throws:
ServiceException

                                             long categoryId,

mimeType - Filtering MIME type or empty string to get resources with all MIME types
copyrightId - Filtering copyright identifier or 0 to get resources with all copyrights
Returns:
List of resources from all categories of current user (except global categories) filtered by user and MIME type and sorted by name
Throws:
ServiceException

isResourceNameAvailable

public boolean isResourceNameAvailable(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                       long categoryId,
                                       long resourceId)
Parameters:
resourceName - Resource name to check
categoryId - Category identifier
resourceId - Resource identifier (of the resource to exclude from checking)
Returns:
true if a resource name is available for the indicated category, false otherwise

true if a resource name is available for the indicated category, false otherwise

uploadFromURL

public byte[] uploadFromURL(java.lang.String url,
                            int sizeLimit)
                     throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            java.lang.Exception
Upload a file from an URL to our server.

Parameters:
url - URL from which we are going to get the file.
sizeLimit - Maximum size allowed in bytes for the uploaded file (0 or negative value for unlimited maximum size)
Returns:
Contents of the uploaded file as an array of bytes.
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException - Throwed if URL is invalid
java.io.IOException - Throwed if occurs an I/O error
java.lang.Exception - Throwed if uploaded file size is greater than maximum size allowed, to be able to check it the getMessage() method of this exception will return "FILE_SIZE_LIMIT"

getDefaultMimeType

public java.lang.String getDefaultMimeType(java.lang.String ext)
Parameters:
ext - Extension
Returns:
Default MIME type that corresponds to an extension or null if it is not supported a default MIME type for that extension

checkImage

public boolean checkImage(java.io.File file,
                          java.lang.String mimeType)
Check that MIME type of the received file (an image) is the predicted one.

Parameters:
file - File (an image)
mimeType - MIME type of the file (an image)
Returns:
true if MIME type of the received file (an image) is the predicted one, false otherwise

checkMimeType

public java.lang.String checkMimeType(java.io.File file,
                                      java.lang.String ext,
                                      java.lang.String mimeType)
Check that MIME type of the received file is the predicted one.

If it is not then checks that MIME type is the default for the extension associated with the file.

Result is the MIME type of the file or null if check fails.

Parameters:
file - Files
ext - Extension associated with this file (not necessarily the actual extension)
mimeType - Predicted MIME type or null to only check extension
Returns:
MIME type of the file or null if check fails.

getImageDimensionsByMIME

public int[] getImageDimensionsByMIME(java.io.File file,
                                      java.lang.String mimeType)
Parameters:
file - File
mimeType - MIME type of the file
Returns:
Dimensions of an image file as an array of 2 integer values: first value will be width and second one height, both values will be measured in pixels
